about_the_game:
In this harrowing adventure, you awaken in the heart of a mysterious, ever-changing place with no memory of how you arrived. As the sun sets, an eerie transformation takes place, turning the once tranquil world into a realm of darkness and dread.



Survive and Thrive: You must scavenge for supplies, weapons, and tools to stay alive. Craft makeshift weapons and build shelters to withstand the relentless terror that haunts the night. Your choices will determine whether you live to see another dawn.

Unearth Your Past: As you explore deeper into the world, you'll uncover cryptic clues and hidden secrets that hint at the truth of your predicament. Unravel the dark history of the that place, your connection to it, and the malevolent forces that hold you captive.

Survival Mechanics: Manage your hunger, thirst, and exhaustion to maintain your strength. Keep your sanity in check, as prolonged exposure to the horrors may lead to madness.

Multiple Endings: Your choices will have a profound impact on the story, leading to multiple possible endings. Will you find a way to escape the place sinister grasp, or will you succumb to the darkness?

Infinite World: We presents a dynamically generated open world that stretches endlessly in every direction. There are no boundaries to your exploration, and no two playthroughs are the same. The world seems to shift and evolve with each passing night, offering a unique and unpredictable experience every time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
